name: Alien Buffet (Daedream)
description:
IMPORTANT What do you think of the game? Don't forget to rate and comment suggestions (:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made in 48hr for the Mashup Game Jam 2.

Eat as many apples as you can while dodging bullets coming from the police outside - you ate most of the restaurant's apples so the police are trying to kill you.

The number (On the top left) represents your food points. Click on the apples to gain food points. (You teleport the apples once you click them). If you get hit by a bullet your hunger points go down. If your hunger points hit zero your dead. Oh yeah, your hunger points also deplete even if you haven't touched a bullet.
